title: 迷你方块能联机吗？
author: Johnny
txt_content: 如题，如果能的话请告诉我联机的方法，谢谢

replies.author: strawmaine
replies.txt_content:
Johnny 发表于 2012-5-15 20:29 
谢谢，但是我不知道为什么我下下来的是一个EXE文件，你能作为附件传上来吗



LittleBlocksModServer1.13.zip
(42.97 KB, 下载次数: 20)



2012-5-15 20:37 上传
点击文件名下载附件

replies.author: jesse
replies.txt_content: 能，具体装mod方法看联机版置顶帖

replies.author: strawmaine
replies.txt_content:
官方帖子里有官方服务端版本

服务端装MLMP server，创建mods文件夹，把littleblocks server放进去

貌似不行，底座创造不出来，底座是泥土做的对吧
服务端和客户端都装了？

replies.author: strawmaine
replies.txt_content:
英文看得懂么，官方的安装说明

Instalation安装 (1.2.5)
Client客户端
Install ModLoader
DOWNLOAD | THREAD
Install ModLoaderMP
DOWNLOAD | THREAD
Install the mod
Simply drop all the files from the .zip into your minecraft.jar except the readme.txt (META-INF folder should already be deleted).
DOWNLOAD

Server服务端

The SMP version should work great except pistons and other tile entities.

Install ModLoaderMP Server
DOWNLOAD | THREAD
Install the mod
Simply drop all the files from the .rar into your minecraft_server.jar except the readme.txt (don't delete META-INF folder)
DOWNLOAD
